abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.effect: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sharp Claws
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
